instructions: From any home screen, tap Apps. Tap the Google folder. Tap Voice Search. Say "open" followed by the name of the app. Example: "Open Google+." The app opens and is ready for use

From any home screen, tap Apps. Tap the Google folder. Tap Voice Search. Say "email" followed by the name of the recipient. Example: "Email John Smith." When prompted, speak the message. When finished, tap Send.

From any home screen, tap Apps. Tap Messaging. Tap Compose. Choose the message recipient. Tap the Enter message field. Tap the Microphone key located two keys to the left of the Space key. Speak the desired text. When finished, tap Send.
